Reviews.Title: “Very friendly helpful management”
Reviews.Author: Kengele
Reviews.Content: situated metres piazza campo de fiori daily market evening restaurants terraces excellent location ancient rome vatican near lots restaurants activity hotel lovely building tiny lift lounge mezzanine floor practical clean fairly spartan 3 beds bathrooms clean simple hotel management professional helpful hotel worth cost considering central location dont expect palace

Reviews.Title: “Great location and beautiful rooftop garden”
Reviews.Author: MiamiMusician
Reviews.Content: third summer stayed albergo del sole rome music festival location tremendous minute walk campo di fiore buy breakfast air market 3 minute walk piazza navona beautiful gardens including roof garden amazing view rome hotel manager employees friendly helpful music festival restaurant located immediately leaving sole eggplant crepes lasagna wonderful lasagna available lunchtime sundays arrange schedule according

Reviews.Title: “Great location, friendly staff, wonderful roof garden”
Reviews.Author: thomastravels5
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel children ages 19 21 location perfect roof deck sit busy day look domes highly recommend hotel location friendly staff

Reviews.Title: “A nice and good hotel in the historical center of Rome”
Reviews.Author: CFU_7
Reviews.Content: luxury hotel positioned 1 min walking campo dei fiori hotel rome charm alittle clean nice view recomand hotel friends
